name: spreadsheetSetFooter
description: Adds a footer to the specified worksheet.

params.name: spreadsheetObj
params.description: The Excel spreadsheet object to which to add the footer.

params.name: leftFooter
params.description: Adds the footer in the left side of the worksheet.

params.name: centerFooter
params.description: Adds the footer in the center of the worksheet.

params.name: rightFooter
params.description: Adds the footer in the right side of the worksheet.
